quest_name: Scythe of the Shadowed Soul (Necromancer Epic 1.0)

steps.description: Go to Mountains of Rathe and kill Sir Edwin Motte. Loot Head of Sir Edwin Motte.
Go to Lake Rathetear and find Kazen Fecae. Give him Head of Sir Edwin Motte to receive Symbol of the Apprentice.
Obtain a Flowing Black Robe from Najena or The Overthere.
Go to Nektulos Forest and find Venenzi Oberzendi. Give her Symbol of the Apprentice to receive Twisted Symbol of the Apprentice. Then give her Flowing Black Robe to receive Rolling Stone Moss.
Go back to Lake Rathetear and find Emkel Kabae. Give him Twisted Symbol of the Apprentice and Rolling Stone Moss to receive Symbol of the Serpent.
Go to Chardok and kill Grand Herbalist Mak`ha. Loot Manisi Herb.

Find Ssessthrass in Swamp of No Hope. Give him Symbol of the Serpent to receive Scaled Symbol of the Serpent. Then give him Scaled Symbol of the Serpent and Manisi Herb to receive Refined Manisi Herb.

Go back to Lake Rathetear and find Emkel Kabae. Give him Refined Manisi Herb to receive Symbol of Testing. Then give Symbol of Testing to Kazen Fecae to spawn three named mobs: a bone golem, a failed apprentice, and a tortured soul. Kill them and loot Symbol of Insanity from a tortured soul.
Go to Plane of Sky and complete the quest for Cloak of Spiroc Feathers.
Go to Plane of Fear and kill Cazic-Thule to loot Slime Blood of Cazic-Thule.
Go to Plane of Hate and kill Innoruuk to loot Eye of Innoruuk.

Combine Symbol of Insanity, Cloak of Spiroc Feathers, Slime Blood of Cazic-Thule, and Eye of Innoruuk in Enchanterâ€™s Sack to create Sack for Kazen. Give Sack for Kazen to Kazen Fecae in Lake Rathetear to receive Scythe of the Shadowed Soul.
